name: Mushroom Jack Fajitas
ingredients: 1 large red bell pepper, julienned (about 8 ounces)
4 1/2 teaspoons granular Splenda or equivalent liquid Splenda

instructions.en: Combine marinade ingredients and pour over chicken in a large zipper bag. Marinate in the refrigerator for 2 hours or longer.
Grill the chicken and keep warm.
Cook peppers and onion in oil until tender-crisp and slightly browned. Season with salt and set aside.
Saut√© mushrooms in bacon grease. Season with salt.
Assemble: Arrange peppers and onions on a platter, top with sliced chicken, cheese, mushrooms, and bacon bits. Let stand until cheese melts.

notes: Makes 6 servings. Do not freeze. Optional toppings (not included in nutritional info): Salsa, Sour cream, Guacamole, Shredded lettuce, Pico de gallo.
